definitions.definition: The place where anything is fixed; situation; local position
examples: the site of a city or of a house

definitions.definition: A place fitted or chosen for any certain permanent use or occupation
The posture or position of a thing.
A computer installation, particularly one associated with an intranet or internet service or telecommunications .
A category together with a choice of Grothendieck topology .
Region of a protein, a piece of DNA or RNA where chemical reactions take place.
A part of the body which has been operated on.

main_definition: The place where anything is fixed; situation; local position

A computer installation, particularly one associated with an intranet or internet service or telecommunications .

Region of a protein, a piece of DNA or RNA where chemical reactions take place.
A part of the body which has been operated on.
